description: This Java class configures the auditor awareness mechanism in a Spring Data context, providing the current user's identifier for auditing purposes.

classes.name: AuditorAwareConfig
classes.description: Implementation of Spring Data's AuditorAware interface, providing logic to determine the current auditor (user) for audit purposes.

methods.name: getCurrentAuditor
methods.description: Returns the current user's identifier if available; otherwise, defaults to 'SYSTEM_USER'.
